item.title: Scatterplot
item.description: Hello all! Letâ€™s make a scatterplot to look at career homeruns and strikeouts from players who had more than 400 homeruns. First, install the following packages in R-Studio. library(Lahman) library(sqldf) library(devtools) library(ggplot2) After the packages are installed, it is time to extract the data with an sql request. query<-"SELECT playerID,sum(HR) AS CareerHR,sum(SO) AS CareerSO FROM Batting GROUP BY playerID HAVING sum(HR)>400" result<-sqldf(query) After the data is extracted, it is time to visualize the data.
